title: Intermediary Organizations
prompt: A cluttered wooden table in soft morning light scattered with papers, folders, and organizational documents, hands of multiple people reaching across to point at different sections, a coffee cup and eyeglasses pushed to the side, window behind showing a rural county road and open fieldsâ€”photographed from above at a slight angle to capture the collaborative tension and layered complexity of coordinating multiple organizations, with warm golden hour light creating deep shadows between the papers and a sense of quiet negotiation happening in real time.
